title: LP gains and losses?
body: It so happens that since the reworked "Ranked system" has hit live, I've been experiencing tremendous and quite disgusting lp win/loss ratios in solo/duo que. Is this a bug? For example, on a single win, I would only get 11-13 lp added to my rank. On a loss, however, I would lose about 20-25 lp. I don't know if this is the new ranked system, pre-season changes or a bug, but if it is supposed to be the "improvements" that Riot has stated about the whole new system, then it's anything but that. Like climbing out of silver wasn't hard enough...
